Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B CLIA-Waived Kit
Regulation Name(s): Influenza Virus Antigen Detection Test System
Devices Detecting Influenza A, B, and C Virus Antigens
Specimen Container(s): Reaction tube prefilled with lysing agent
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B CLIA-Waived Kit using chromatographic immunoassay and BD Veritor Plus Analyzer for detection of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the diagnosis of influenza A and B viral infections in symptomatic patients by direct and qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs; negative results are presumptive and require confirmation by viral culture or FDA-cleared molecular assay; not intended to detect influenza C antigens
